'''Evan Arnold''' is a patient who was injured in a car accident and was diagnosed with HIV in the hospital.

==History==
Evan was in a car accident with [[Jacob Deever]]. He wasn't wearing a seatbelt, so he had more serious injuries. In the hospital, he was recognized as a male prostitute. His injuries were treated and he stayed in the hospital to recover.

When Jacob tested positive for HIV, they asked Evan if he always uses condoms with his tricks and he said he did, but when he found out they were asking because of Jacob, he said that Jacob was his boyfriend, not a trick.

Evan went with Jacob to tell his wife that he was gay and had HIV. She said she always knew he was gay and told Evan to take care of him. However, when she learned that Jacob had exposed her to HIV, she slapped him and left.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is dating [[Jacob Deever]].

==Career==
He is a prostitute.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He was 22 at the time of the car accident.
